Key Match Events: The Charlotte Hornets defended home turf and upset the Phoenix Suns last night in an all-around impressive display.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Brandon Miller struggled offensively with 13 points on 16 shots, but he often had the unenviable task of defending the red-hot Devin Booker.
Brandon Miller met up with fellow Charlotte sports star Bryce Young after the game.
Others: Brandon Miller and Bryce Young have a lot in common, as they're both Alamaba alumni who landed in the Queen City.
The NFL Draft is in the spring before freshmen show up for the year, but they're arguably two of the most prominent athletes to come out of the university recently.
